divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking out the trash and I happened to look up at the sky, and I saw this flying triangle. It had three white lights and had a silvery-grey or black body(the sun glare was preventing me from mostly seeing the body of the thing)and was making sharp turns worthy of an F-22 Raptor jet. However, this craft looked more like a B-2 or the shape of the alleged Aurora hypersonic airplane. After around a half-minute, it stopped making those turns and started to move away at a very fast speed.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Laurel
There were no other sightings in Laurel on or around August 15th 2008
